nodes.title: Note：About API Node
widgets_values:
[About API Node](https://docs.comfy.org/tutorials/partner-nodes/overview) - [Pricing](https://docs.comfy.org/tutorials/partner-nodes/pricing) | [API 节点](https://docs.comfy.org/zh-CN/tutorials/partner-nodes/overview) - [定价](https://docs.comfy.org/zh-CN/tutorials/partner-nodes/pricing)
 
To use the API, you must be in a secure network environment:

- Allows access from `127.0.0.1` or `localhost`.

- Use our API Node in website services starting with `https`

- Make sure you can normally connect to our API services (some regions may need a proxy).

- Make sure you are logged in in the settings and that your account still has enough credits to cover the consumption of API calls.

- On non-whitelisted sites or local area networks (LANs), please try to [log in using an API Key](https://docs.comfy.org/interface/user#logging-in-with-an-api-key).

Backlighting, medium shot, sunset, soft light, silhouette, central composition, circular camera movement. The camera follows the character from behind to the front, showing a rugged cowboy gripping his holster tightly, his eyes alert as he patrols the desolate Western ghost town. The cowboy wears a worn brown leather jacket, with a bullet belt around his waist and the brim of his hat pulled low. His outline is sketched into a soft silhouette by the setting sun. Behind him are dilapidated wooden buildings with long-broken windows, glass shards scattered on the ground, and dust swirling in the wind. The camera slowly circles from his back to his front, with light pouring from behind, creating a strong dramatic contrast. The scene presents warm tones, enhancing the desolate atmosphere.
